Create a consistent Arrow schema from a data frame

Source: R/convert.R
create_arrow_schema.Rd

Maps R types to specific Arrow types to ensure consistent schemas across chunks and files.

Usage

create_arrow_schema(data)

Arguments

data

A data frame to create a schema from.

Value

An Arrow schema with consistent types.

On this page
